dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Number 1,137 Kazakh citizens are registered with the Consulate General in Istanbul, according to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Number eleven thirty seven Kazakh citizens are registered with the Consulate General in Istanbul, according to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A total of 1,137 Kazakh citizens are registered with the Consulate General of Kazakhstan in Istanbul.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, that's a significant number of people. And they're saying no requests for assistance have come in from them yet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow, that's a significant number of people. And they're saying no requests for assistance have come in from them yet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As of now, no requests for assistance have been received from Kazakh citizens in Turkey by the Consulate General of Kazakhstan in Istanbul.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and this was a 6.2 magnitude quake near Istanbul, followed by aftershocks of 5.0 and 5.3. The epicenter was in the Marmara Sea.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and this was a six point two magnitude quake near Istanbul, followed by aftershocks of five point zero and five point three. The epicenter was in the Marmara Sea.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A 6.2 magnitude earthquake struck Istanbul today. Later, two more tremors with magnitudes of 5.0 and 5.3 were recorded in the same area.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's uh, it's really concerning. I saw some footage from a live TV broadcast where you could actually see the moment it started shaking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's uh, it's really concerning. I saw some footage from a live T V broadcast where you could actually see the moment it started shaking.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: One video captured the moment the earthquake began during a live TV broadcast.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and social media is showing some damage, like an abandoned three-story building collapsing in the Fatih district.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and social media is showing some damage, like an abandoned three-story building collapsing in the Fatih district.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For example, in the Fatih district of Istanbul, an abandoned three-story building collapsed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But thankfully, no reports so far of any casualties, which is a huge relief.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But thankfully, no reports so far of any casualties, which is a huge relief.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: There have been no reports of casualties so far, but social media users are posting about structural damage.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. The Kazakh diplomats are coordinating with Turkish authorities and urging their people to stay calm and follow local instructions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. The Kazakh diplomats are coordinating with Turkish authorities and urging their people to stay calm and follow local instructions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "The Ministry of Foreign Affairs is monitoring the situation in coordination with Turkish authorities and Kazakhstan's diplomatic missions in Turkey," the MFA press service stated. "We urge our fellow citizens to remain calm and cautious and to strictly follow the instructions of local authorities," the ministry added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the Turkish Parliament Speaker, Numan Kurtulmus, he actually said citizens should be prepared because an earthquake is already at the doorstep.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the Turkish Parliament Speaker, Numan Kurtulmus, he actually said citizens should be prepared because an earthquake is already at the doorstep.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Meanwhile, Turkish Parliament Speaker Numan Kurtulmus urged citizens to be prepared for an earthquake that is already at the doorstep.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's a pretty stark warning, isn't it? Makes you realize how urgent the situation feels on the ground.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a pretty stark warning, isn't it? Makes you realize how urgent the situation feels on the ground.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It sounds like everyone's on high alert, monitoring for any further developments or needs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It sounds like everyone's on high alert, monitoring for any further developments or needs.
